name: mongoscraper
description:
Home Tab

The home tab will view all the articles that were 'scraped' from New York Times

Saved Articles Tab

This tab will direct you to your saved articles

Here you will be able to remove or add notes to the articles you saved

Scrape New Articles Button

This button will scrape the latest articles on 'New York Times' web-page

Code

I used cheerio to scrape news article

Used Mongoose to help communicate with Database
